mapper.update: update smbms_provider set proCode=#{proCode}, proName=#{proName}, proDesc=#{proDesc}, proContact=#{proContact},proPhone=#{proPhone}, proAddress=#{ proAddress}, ProFax=#{ProFax},createdBy=#{createdBy}, creationDate=#{creationDate}, modifyDate=#{ modifyDate}, modifyBy=#{ modifyBy} where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into smbms_provider ( proCode, proName, proDesc, proContact,proPhone, proAddress, ProFax,createdBy, creationDate, modifyDate,modifyBy) values (#{proCode},#{proName}#{proDesc},#{proContact},#{proPhone},#{proAddress},#{ProFax}, #{createdBy},#{creationDate},#{modifyDate},#{modifyBy})
